GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.15 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
jffs2: fix memory leak in jffs2_scan_medium

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 52ba0ab4f0a606f02a6163493378989faa1ec10a, it was introduced in version v2.6.15 by commit e631ddba588783edd521c5a89f7b2902772fb691. For more details please see the references link.
